channel.title: Script Problem (AutoPwner) & non script related problem
channel.description:
Here is the topic to the script I am using: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,168768.0.html
It seems like an excellent script, but every once in awhile it logs out and says next player in the scar window. I just want to use it on one character, but cannot figure it out. If anyone knows how to I'd appreciate the help.
My other problem is randoms. I have the newest Scar Devi 3.12 or w/e. I have the latest SRL. Mind you, I haven't ever autoed on rs2 prior to a couple days ago using scar. Last time I autoed was about 5 years ago on rsc. I thought I downloaded all the includes I needed, but if anyone could help me set it up so all randoms are covered? I seen it solve the box random, but sandwich lady and the drill instructor it did not solve.

item.title: Script Problem (AutoPwner) & non script related problem
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

LogOutPlayerEvery = True; //Log Player Out for a while Every ??? Mins(See Below) LogEveryMark = 15; //Time Between Each LogOut(Minutes) MaxAttempts = 15; //How many times to search for monster before script makes player false TimeLoggedIn = 0; //Time for each player to stay logged in, in minutes //0 To stay in until something happens

To use only one player, Fill in only one player o_O?

Read full topic
item.source: Script Problem (AutoPwner) & non script related problem
